verses.verse: Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> you were like my <S%H251>brother,<s%> who <S%H3243>nursed<s%> from the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of my <S%H517>mother!<s%> If I <S%H4672>found<s%> you <S%H2351>outside,<s%> I would <S%H5401>kiss<s%> <S%H936>you;<s%> yes, and no one would despise me.

I would <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H935>you,<s%> bringing you into my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> who would <S%H3925>instruct<s%> <S%H8248>me.<s%> I would have you drink <S%H7544>spiced<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> of the <S%H6071>juice<s%> of my <S%H7416>pomegranate.<s%>
His left <S%H8040>hand<s%> would be under my <S%H7218>head.<s%> His right <S%H3225>hand<s%> would embrace <S%H2263>me.<s%>
I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> <S%H1323>you,<s%> daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that you not stir <S%H5782>up,<s%> nor <S%H5782>awaken<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> until it so <S%H2654>desires.<s%> Friends

Who is this who comes <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H7514>leaning<s%> on her <S%H1730>beloved?<s%> Under the apple <S%H8598>tree<s%> I <S%H5782>aroused<s%> <S%H517>you.<s%> There your mother <S%H2254>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>you.<s%> There she was in labor and bore <S%H2254>you.<s%>

<S%H7760>Set<s%> me as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> on your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> on your <S%H2220>arm;<s%> for <S%H160>love<s%> is <S%H5794>strong<s%> as <S%H4194>death.<s%> <S%H7068>Jealousy<s%> is as <S%H7186>cruel<s%> as <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%> Its <S%H7565>flashes<s%> are <S%H7565>flashes<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> a very flame of <S%H7957>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> neither can <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H7857>drown<s%> <S%H376>it.<s%> If a man would <S%H5414>give<s%> all the <S%H1952>wealth<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H160>love,<s%> he would be <S%H936>utterly<s%> <S%H936>scorned.<s%> Friends

We have a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H269>sister.<s%> She has no <S%H7699>breasts.<s%> What shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for our <S%H269>sister<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she is to be spoken <S%H1696>for?<s%>

If she is a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> we will <S%H1129>build<s%> on her a <S%H2918>turret<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> if she is a <S%H1817>door,<s%> we will <S%H6696>enclose<s%> her with <S%H3871>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar.<s%> Beloved
I am a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and my <S%H7699>breasts<s%> like <S%H4026>towers,<s%> then I was in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> like one who <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> at Baal <S%H1174>Hamon.<s%> He leased <S%H5414>out<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> to <S%H5201>keepers.<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> was to <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> for its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

My own <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H505>me.<s%> The thousand are for <S%H8010>you,<s%> Solomon; two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> for those who <S%H5201>tend<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%> Lover
You who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens,<s%> with <S%H2270>friends<s%> in <S%H7181>attendance,<s%> let me <S%H7181>hear<s%> your <S%H6963>voice!<s%> Beloved
Come <S%H1272>away,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved!<s%> Be <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> or a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>stag<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1314>spices!<s%>
